mapper.sql: elementID, elementName, elementFunction, elementStyle, sortNum, isCurrent, isDelete, theNote
mapper.select:
select count(1) from permission_element a inner join permission_resource b on a.elementID = b.selfID
a.isDelete=1 AND b.selfType = 'SYS_ELEMENT'
AND a.elementName like '%${elementName}%'
AND b.parentID = #{resourceID ,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(1) from permission_element a inner join permission_resource b on a.elementID = b.selfID where a.isDelete = 1 and b.selfType = 'SYS_ELEMENT' and b.parentID = #{parentID, jdbcType=INTEGER } and a.elementName = #{elementName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.elementID, a.elementName, a.elementFunction, a.elementStyle, a.sortNum, a.isCurrent, a.isDelete, a.theNote from permission_element a where a.isDelete = 1 and a.elementID = #{elementID, jdbcType=INTEGER}
